email_body: Hello: I am John Arnold. I believe you're looking for Jeff Arnold. pfse@dynegy.com on 09/27/2000 05:30:27 PM To: Jeff.Arnold@enron.com cc: Subject: Re: Evening jeff, thanks for the directions - i have already forwarded them home. tonight is not good for me but perhaps one day we will finally connect now that we are closer! i've been thinking about sunday and hope you have a deck of cards to play with (perhaps 2 decks of uno cards).
